document.full_text: novak djokovic's unbeaten run over the last 39 matches has included some notable victims: he has beaten rafael nadal and roger federer a total of seven times in that span.
document.title: djokovic hones a masterful winning streak
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic's unbeaten run over the last 39 matches has included some notable victims: he has beaten rafael nadal and roger federer a total of seven times in that span.
